company.name: Podcast Guest Launch
company.tagline: Scale podcast guest appearances without the grind

guarantee: 5 Placements in 5 Months Guaranteed: If you don't get 5 confirmed bookings within 5 months of kickoff, we keep working at no extra charge until you do—or you get your money back.

dfy.name: Done-For-You Booking
inclusions: Professional media kit that sells you
Personalized pitch creation for each show

steps.title: Approve Target Shows
steps.description: We research and present vetted podcast matches. You approve shows that align with your goals. Takes 10 minutes per week.

steps.title: We Pitch & Handle Back-and-Forth
steps.description: Our team crafts personalized pitches. We handle all correspondence and follow-ups. You stay updated via dashboard.

steps.title: You Record—Done
steps.description: Receive booking confirmations and prep materials. Show up and deliver value. We track placements and ROI.

faq.question: What's included in the $1,000 package?
faq.answer: Our DFY service includes comprehensive podcast research, personalized pitch creation, all outreach and follow-ups, booking coordination, scheduling, and pre-interview prep materials. We handle everything from start to finish.

faq.question: How soon can I expect my first booking?
faq.answer: Most clients receive their first booking within 2-4 weeks of starting. You're guaranteed 5 bookings within 5 months, or we keep working at no extra charge until you reach 5—or you get your money back.

faq.question: Who writes the pitches?
faq.answer: Our team writes all pitches using proven templates with a 17.5% success rate. Each pitch is personalized to the podcast and highlights why you'd be a great fit for their audience.

faq.question: Can I approve shows before outreach?
faq.answer: Absolutely! We present vetted podcast matches and you approve which shows we pitch to. You have full control over where you appear.

faq.question: What if I don't get 5 bookings?
faq.answer: Our guarantee is simple: if you don't get 5 confirmed bookings within 5 months, we keep working at no additional cost until you do. If you're still not satisfied, we offer a full money-back guarantee.
